featured.headline: Great news for xAI: Grok is now pretty good at answering questions about Baldur’s Gate
featured.summary: A new report from Business Insider reveals that high-level engineers at xAI were pulled off other projects to make sure Grok could answer detailed questions about the video game "Baldur's Gate."...
